headline: Datadog (DDOG) PT Lifted to $170 on AI-Driven Usage Growth
summary: Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) is one of the Hot AI Stocks on Wall Street’s Radar. On August 7, DA Davidson analyst Gil Luria raised the price target on the stock to $170.00 (from $160.00) while maintaining a Buy rating. The firm continues to highlight Datadog as a top pick, with the rating affirmation following Datadog’s “ strong […]
